name: Catana Project
description:
Catana is a game project that all started on Memorial Day Weekend 2021. The concept started with my wife's wonderful flash sheets of Cat Samurais. Then it turned into a graphic novel idea. So then, together we thought we should make a game out of this wonderful fantastic idea. Enjoy this very basic prototype of our cat Samurai Adventure CATANA!

CREATORS

David Brock

Elizabeth Brock

Chris Johnson

Holly Bancroft
